step3.title: We handle the admin, you handle the coaching.
step3.description: This is your command center. Track your earnings with detailed analytics, manage your client relationships, and never worry about invoicing again. We manage secure payments, global tax compliance, and provide you with all B2B documents for seamless bookkeeping.

client.a1: Simple and transparent. You only pay the price set by the coach, plus any applicable VAT. There are no hidden platform fees or subscriptions for clients. The price you see is the price you pay.
client.q2: How do I ensure a coach is a good fit?
client.a2: We give you the tools to find the perfect connection! We recommend watching a coach's intro video, reading their profile and user reviews, and messaging them before booking. This ensures your goals and their approach are perfectly aligned for a successful journey.
client.q3: Is my data private and secure?
client.a3: Absolutely. Our database uses secure encryption for all data. Even in the event of a breach, all data is encrypted and cannot be read or used. Your personal information is stored securely and never shared with third parties without your explicit consent. For more details, see our full privacy policy.

coach.a1: Our standard platform fee is 9.9%. This fee covers platform maintenance, refunds, and marketing, allowing us to continuously improve the platform for you and connect you with more clients. From your gross earnings, the platform fee, VAT, and payment provider transaction fees are deducted. You'll see detailed cost breakdowns on all receipts.
coach.q2: How and when do I get paid?
coach.a2: Our system uses an automated, delayed payout schedule to ensure financial accuracy. After a client's payment is completed, the funds are held for a 24-hour security period. Afterward, the funds become part of your next scheduled payout, which is automatically transferred to your connected Stripe account. This eliminates manual requests and ensures a reliable and predictable payment cycle.
coach.q3: What skills do I need to support others?
coach.a3: We believe everyone has something valuable to share—whether it's learned skills, personal life experience, or simply the willingness to listen. While formal certifications can be a great advantage in certain fields, they are not a prerequisite. What truly matters here is the human connection: your empathy and your readiness to guide and support others on their journey. Our platform brings people together who are looking for exactly that: mutual learning and support.
